'''Xilonen''' is a playable {{Geo}} character in ''[[Genshin Impact]]''.

A Name Engraver for the [[Children of Echoes]] bearing her own [[Ancient Name]] of {{Ancient Name|BRK|'''Baraka'''|bearer=1}}, Xilonen is often found enjoying her leisure time with naps in the sun but at the forge, her craftsmanship is second to none.
